mapper.select: select ad.activity_id as activityId,su.photo as elderLogo,su.name as elderName, ad.sys_elder_user_id as elderId,ad.create_date as discussDate,ad.content as discussContent from activity_discuss ad inner join sys_elder_user seu on ad.sys_elder_user_id=seu.id inner join sys_user su on seu.sys_user_id=su.id where ad.activity_id=#{id} ORDER BY discussDate DESC limit #{page}
